title: Mississippi to Create Special Justice System for Just One City: Majority-Black Jackson
description:
Part of a national backlash against criminal justice reforms, the move takes away local control and hands it to an unelected officials appointed by Republicans.

The post Mississippi to Create Special Justice System for Just One City: Majority-Black Jackson appeared first on The Intercept.

title: Oklahoma Court: We Want Richard Glossip Dead and Evidence Be Damned
description:
In a stunning rebuke to the state’s attorney general, the appeals court refused to vacate Glossip’s conviction, clearing the way for his execution.

The post Oklahoma Court: We Want Richard Glossip Dead and Evidence Be Damned appeared first on The Intercept.

title: Police Shot Atlanta Cop City Protester 57 Times, Autopsy Finds
description:
It looks like Manuel “Tortuguita” Terán was executed by firing squad — underscoring why we must stop the massive police training center.

The post Police Shot Atlanta Cop City Protester 57 Times, Autopsy Finds appeared first on The Intercept.

title: Pentagon Requests $36 Million for Havana Syndrome
description:
New military budget would fund research as well as treatment for “anomalous health incidents.”

The post Pentagon Requests $36 Million for Havana Syndrome appeared first on The Intercept.
